Duncanville City Council
------------------------

![Duncanville City Council group portrait. Seven council members are posed indoors in front of the city logo, with the U.S. and Texas flags visible on either side. Four men stand in the back row wearing suits, and three members, two women and one man, are seated in the front row, also dressed in formal attire.](https://cdnsm5-hosted2.civiclive.com/UserFiles/Servers/Server_61032/Image/City%20Hall/%20Government/Duncanville%20City%20Council/2025%20City%20Council.jpg "Duncanville City Council group portrait. Seven council members are posed indoors in front of the city logo, with the U.S. and Texas flags visible on either side. Four men stand in the back row wearing suits, and three members, two women and one man, are seated in the front row, also dressed in formal attire.")The Duncanville City Council consists of seven members, including the [mayor elected at large](https://www.duncanvilletx.gov/cms/one.aspx?portalId=61116&pageId=72380), one [council member elected at-larg](https://www.duncanvilletx.gov/cms/one.aspx?portalId=61116&pageId=72383)e, and five council members elected from single-member districts.

City Council Members serve two-year terms, expiring on staggered years. The mayor, district two member, and district four member expire on even-numbered years. Council members and representatives from district one, district three, and district five have terms that expire on odd-numbered years.

### Form of Government

The City of Duncanville has a "[Council-Manager](https://www.duncanvilletx.gov/common/pages/DownloadFileByUrl.aspx?key=ytCWij3NIsZVF02IrueSjDeHKzmIbOW7JCJxUHsOY5dUkgWp5yUdqkYysPJg8oTZCSo9RXUbpMNfnL7e9nuh%2baP86q2yhZqh1aZcJjXQWjkdn3U5mM3LcoclyI9Ov0D%2bkKls%2fhledOC7w4DHvzwk0nWq%2fYMmOVCzFMoLXaSLCnaIPQ5PVJ0lwJ6kuERrI9r41mbQJw%3d%3d "Click here to read the Home Rule Charter.")" type of government. The City Council, enacts local legislation, adopts [budgets](https://www.duncanvilletx.gov/cms/one.aspx?portalId=61116&pageId=74126), determines policies, appoints the Judge of the [Municipal Court](https://www.duncanvilletx.gov/cms/one.aspx?portalId=61116&pageId=74846), and appoints a professional [City Manager](https://www.duncanvilletx.gov/cms/one.aspx?portalId=61116&pageId=73846) to carry out day-to-day administrative government operations.

### City Council Meetings

The [Duncanville City Council](https://maps.app.goo.gl/f7dW7KL4bhRC5izJ7 "Get directions to Duncanville City Hall using Google Maps.") meets twice per month, on the [first Tuesday](https://www.duncanvilletx.gov/events "Visit the Events Calendar.") and the [third Tuesday](https://www.duncanvilletx.gov/events "Visit the Events Calendar.") of every month, at City Hall. A typical Council meeting includes:

* 6:00 PM: Work Session/Briefing - Briefing Room
* 7:00 PM: Regular Session - Council Chambers

City elections are held each May. Visit [Dallas County Elections](https://www.dallascountyvotes.org/ "Visit the Dallas County Elections website to learn more.") for more election information.

### The City of Duncanville Work Plan

On September 20, 2016 the Duncanville City Council formally adopted the FY 2017 Work Plan, which includes the Council's [Mission Statement](https://www.duncanvilletx.gov/cms/One.aspx?portalId=61116&pageId=73856 "Visit the Council Mission Statement") and the Six Capstones.
